On 15 November 2013 I purchased a residential apartment in Kingston, ACT with my wife (Jennifer Porter) as joint tenants. This property is owned for the purpose of being used as a secondary residence.
Mortgage for residential property in Kingston, ACT
On 25 November 2013 my wife (Jennifer Porter) commenced remunerated employment as a Law Lecturer
On 19 October 2013 I attended, along with my wife (Jennifer Porter), the Telethon Ball as a guest
On 2 November 2013 I attended, along with my wife (Jennifer Porter), the Ronald McDonald Charities Ball as a guest
Accepted a complimentary annual Subscription Television Service from ASTRA Subscription Television Australia for the Electorate Office. The value of this service is $1734.00.
Attended the Test Match in Perth along with my wife Jennifer, as a guest

Appointed to the Board of the Western Australian Cricket Association ('WACCA') as a non-Executive Director. The WACCA Board position of a non-Executive Director, is voluntary and completely unremunerated.

disclosures.entity: Royal Automobile Club ('RAC') of Western Australia
disclosures.details: Attended the Bruce Springsteen concert at the Perth Arena along with my wife Jennifer, as a guest

disclosures.entity: Curtin University Law School Advisory Board
disclosures.details: Accepted an offer to sit on the Curtin University Law School Advisory Board ('the Board'). The Board position is purely voluntary and there is no remuneration
Accepted the invitation from Virgin Australia's CEO Mr John Borghetti for my spouse and I to obtain membership of Virgin Australia's 'The Club', as part of the Velocity Frequent Flyer program.
Received a gift from Ambassador Chang from the Taipei Economic and Cultural Office. The gift (a decorative phoenix wall hanging) is of an unspecified value.
Undertook a trip to the UAE as a guest of the UAE Government and HH The Crown Prince of Abu Dhabi. Flights and accommodation were provided by the UAE Government.
Universal electrical adaptor (estimated value under $100)
Medallion (estimated value under $100) presented by the UAE Presidential Guard.

disclosures.entity: Australian Forces operating from Minhad Air Base
disclosures.details: Medallion (estimated value under $100) presented by Australian Forces operating from Minhad Air Base.
Model of Emirates aircraft A380 (estimated value under $100)
Accepted an annual Honorary Membership. The value of this membership is $180.00.

Attended the International Leaders Programme 2014 (ILP) as a guest of the Government of the United Kingdom through the Foreign and Commonwealth Office (FCO). My business class return travel to the ILP was provided for by the UK FCO, as was accommodation for the period of the ILP.

disclosures.entity: Curtin University Law School Advisory Board
disclosures.details: Resigned my position as a board member on the Curtin University Law School Advisory Board (DELETION)
Resigned my position as a board member on the Western Australian Cricket Association (WACA). (DELETION)
Accepted the gift of a Tiffany Pen. The exact value of the gift is unknown, however it is estimated to be worth between $280 - $380.
Received, via mail, Honorary Membership (unsolicited) to Gloucester Park Harness Racing for the 2015-2016 Season. The value of this membership is $231.00.

Accepted the invitation from Virgin Australia's CEO Mr John Borghetti to renew my Virgin Australia "The Club" Membership, along with my spouse, Mrs Jennifer Porter, as part of their Velocity Frequent Flyer program.
